1.
   
1110 0001 0010 1000   LDI   r18,  0x18
1110 1000 0011 1000   LDI   r19,  0x88
1001 001 10011 0000   STS   r19,  0x005d
0000 0000 0101 1101 
0000 11 1 00000 0010  ADD   0x00, 0x12
1100 1111 1111 1111   RJMP  -1          ; Wait, wouldn't this cause an infinite loop?

2. 

push r17        1001 0011 0001 1111
or r16, r17     0010 10 1 10000 0001
neg r16         1001 010 10000 0001
eor r17, r17    0010 01 1 10001 0001
eor r17, r16    0010 01 1 10001 0000
pop r17         1001 000 10001 1111
